summary: Create a high-level client for control plane operations concerning worker deployments in the TypeScript SDK, following the pattern established in the Go SDK.
userImpact: TypeScript SDK users need a high-level client API to manage worker versioning and deployments, currently unavailable.
proposedFix: Implement a worker versioning control plane client following the Go SDK implementation as a reference.
keyQuote: Create the high-level client for control plane operations concerning worker deployments. See the Go one as an example
